name: Trump Tower Trouble!
description:
Disclaimer: Sadly, the scoreboard for the times is only available on the Scirra arcade version: https://www.scirra.com/arcade/tutorial-games/trump-tower-trouble-33116

Race to the top in this action packed, randomly generated game!

The electricians are leaving the lights on in Trump Tower to rack up your electric bill and you have to stop them!

All music made by Placeboing: www.youtube.com/user/placeboing You NEED to subscribe to him NOW! He had me and my family laughing for a long time!

Feedback and reviews and stuff would also be nice!

Thanks for playing!

Oh yeah if you want you can check out some of my other games:

The Gravity Machine prototype: https://antiquegearstudio.itch.io/the-gravity-machine

The Grand Illusion: https://www.scirra.com/arcade/adventure-games/the-grand-illusion-33020

3-3 Gravity (Post jam version): https://antiquegearstudio.itch.io/3-3-gravity-post-jam-version

Thanks again!
